participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted yet friendly, Alex enjoys deep conversations but often feels shy about expressing his feelings.
participant_1.background: I have a crush on a girl from my class, but I'm too afraid to tell her. I love my family, but they can be very critical of me. I listen to a lot of strange music. While both my parents have thick European accents, I do not. I work part time in the campus library.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and humorous, Jordan is a dedicated parent who loves to share her culinary adventures with others.
participant_2.background: I'm a cook who loves cooking seafood and dressing up for Halloween. I'm a family person and I love to spend time with my kids. Pop is my favorite music. I'm not good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog. I am not a nice person.

content.text: Hey! Hows your day going?
Not too bad, just got home from cooking up a storm in the kitchen!
Oh that sounds fun! What did you cook?
I made some crab cakes and lobster bisque!
Oh that sounds delicious! I wish I could cook like that.
Its really not that hard! If you have the ingredients, you can do it!
I might have to try that out sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd be great at it!
Thanks! I hope so!
So, what do you do for work?
I work part time in the campus library.
Oh cool! Do you like it?
Yeah, its pretty great! I get to meet a lot of interesting people.
Thats awesome! I'm sure you meet some real characters!
Yeah, you do! I just saw a guy dressed up as a pirate the other day!
Haha! That sounds awesome!
It was! I'm sure he was having a great time!
I'm sure he was! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to listen to music, go to concerts, and hang out with friends.
Oh cool! I like to do all of those things too!
That's awesome! We should hang out sometime!
Yeah, that would be fun!
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free
